channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Ambari
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Ambari

item.title: CVE-2022-45855|2024-10-04T13:50:54.277Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ambari
item.description: SpringEL injection in the metrics source in Apache Ambari version 2.7.0 to 2.7.6 allows a malicious authenticated user to execute arbitrary code remotely.Â Users are recommended to upgrade to 2.7.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-42009|2024-10-04T13:49:38.984Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ambari
item.description: SpringEL injection in the server agent in Apache Ambari version 2.7.0 to 2.7.6 allows a malicious authenticated user to execute arbitrary code remotely. Users are recommended to upgrade to 2.7.7.
